name: Ball Drop - Flippy Sky
description:
Ball Drop - Flippy Sky!!!Easy rule, easy control but unlimited fun that's all you will get in game. The splendid 3D effect scene enables you to experience the imaginary traps and barriers. Now, let's control the ball and conquer the world by overcoming challenges.
How to play?
Drag the ball left or right to avoid all obstacles and try not to fall off the track! Challenge your speed with the rhythm of the music and try your best to win each round!
